data.text: Aleke sika bu eƒe keklẽ
Aleke Zion viŋutsu vevi
Amegaxiwo kekeake gɔ̃ hã naa no wo viwo wonona
Tsikɔ na be vidzĩwo ƒe aɖe lé ɖe nu me na wo;
Ame siwo ɖu nu vivi kpeɖiwo tsã la,
Nye amewo ƒe tohehe lolo wu Sodom tɔ,
Woƒe dumegãwo da dzo wu sno,
Ke azɔ la, wonyɔ wu zemabi
Ame siwo tsi yi nu la tɔ nyo wu
Nyɔnu siwo ame ƒe nu wɔa nublanui na la tsɔ
Yehowa nyɔ eƒe dziku ƒe aɖi katã
Anyigbadzifiawo mexɔe se kaka,
Gake edzɔ, le eƒe Nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nu vɔ̃
Azɔ wole asi tsam le kpɔdomewo
Amewo doa ɣli ɖe wo ta be,
Yehowa ŋutɔe kaka wo,
Gawu la, ɖeɖi te míaƒe ŋkuwo ŋu
Amewo le ŋku lém ɖe míaƒe afɔɖeɖe
Ame siwo le mía yome tim la
Yehowa ƒe amesiamina la,
O, Edom vinyɔnu, tso aseye,
O, Zion vinyɔnu, wò tohehe awu enu,
